snippet: Defense lawyers for James E. Holmes, charged with opening fire on a packed Aurora movie theater last summer, said Tuesday that he intended to plead not guilty by reason of insanity in the attack.
abstract: Defense lawyers for Aurora, Colo, shooting suspect James E Holmes say in court filings that he intends to plead not guilty by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: Defense lawyers for James E. Holmes, charged with opening fire on a packed Aurora movie theater last summer, said Tuesday that he intended to plead not guilty by reason of insanity in the attack.

headline.main: Colorado: Massacre Suspect Pursues Insanity Defense
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Massacre Suspect Pursues Insanity Defense
